house_listing.house_description: This townhouse built in 1998 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, skylights, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener,Kitchen Island, Microwave, Pantry, Skylights, Storage Space
